group_1.textLeft: …What's up?@Shouldn't you get back to the banquet?

group_1.textRight: Erm…yes.
I'd like to be pampered by my darling sister@and Lord Marius some more.
But those two seemed to be really enjoying@each other's company.
I don't want to intrude…

group_1.textLeft: She read the mood!

group_1.textRight: Just as Amaryllis planned…?

group_1.textLeft: You like being pampered by them?

group_1.textRight: Yes!
The three of us don't often get the chance@to see each other these days.
Why, at lunch today I needed to run@an errand,
so I barely got the chance to even get@a hug from my dear sister.
I'm feeling quite lonely…

group_1.textLeft: She's gotta be hugging Cornelia all the time…

group_1.textRight: Sounds like she's still a little kid at heart.
And she cherishes both Cornelia and Marius,@doesn't she?

group_1.textLeft: Seems like it…@And if she likes Marius, too,
I might feel kinda guilty about that…

group_1.textRight: But does she like him still?
Like, not like "like" like, but "love" like!

group_1.textLeft: We don't know that yet.
…But still, when you see someone in love,@you wanna root for them, yeah?

group_1.textRight: …Oh goodness, I've certainly imposed@myself on you all!
*Giggle* But I did have fun chatting with@you while it lasted.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, totally!@See you around★
So that's Cornelia's rival, huh?

group_1.textRight: To be honest, this is getting really hard to do…

group_1.textLeft: And it's worse that all three of them seem@to get along really well.

group_1.textRight: Perhaps we'd have been better off not meeting@her, given we must support Cornelia?

group_1.textLeft: I mean, us cuties have feelings too, you know.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, we can't act on pure objectivity@like Kyubey…

group_1.textLeft: Huh?@That reminds me!
Have any of you spotted Kyubey even once@since we arrived?

group_1.textRight: …Now that you mention it, no.
To Kyubey,
we are unidentified Magical Girls from@the future.
As he cannot ascertain whether we are friend@or foe, he may be observing us from afar.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, makes sense… We're Magical Girls he doesn't@know who just randomly popped up one day.
It's the same with Amaryllis, right?

group_1.textCenter: When I returned to the past and met Master@Cubius again for the first time,
it was rather difficult for me to explain@the situation to him.

group_1.textLeft: Hm?!
[chara:103201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]How long have you been there?!

group_1.textRight: Oh, not for long.
The banquet was a great success…
Lady Cornelia and Lord Marius looked like@they had a marvelous time together.
Thanks to you, tonight's plan was a resounding@success!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, so you were there for the dinner?

group_1.textRight: Erm…
I disguised myself as a waiter and other@such roles to catch what was going on.
I also worked to casually offer refreshments@to our preferred Aedile candidate,
so that we could curry favor with him in@anticipation of the upcoming election…

group_1.textLeft: Who's that…?

group_1.textRight: The Aedile is a key position elected@by the people.
He plays a role in influencing the future@policies of the city.
Yes, if someone sympathetic to the need for@evacuating and migrating the city is elected,
it will sway the minds of the councilors,@the ones who hold the real power…

group_1.textLeft: We want to bolster the number of@"evacuationists,"
rather than the reconstructionists who want@to stay to rebuild…
Is that the gist?

group_1.textRight: Yes…@We mustn't do it too quickly, but gradually.

group_1.textLeft: So you've been at the banquet assisting@with the election,
helping trigger more flags to get us on@the History B route?
You have such a funny way of putting@things, Miyurin.
And Cornelia got on great with Marius@without any issue!
So Hiko's conditions for resolving the time@paradox have gotta be fulfilled by now.
Don't you think?

group_1.textRight: What would happen if we did complete them?
Now that the metaphorical "unstable ground"@has been settled...
Perhaps we will be brought closer to the year@79 CE, as was our intention?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:103201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][chara:102901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]*Gasp*

group_1.textRight: We're disappearing…?
